CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We realized a slightly bathochromic shift of the PIDT - DTNT absorbance relative to that of the PIDT - EHNT , which was in consistent with the trend realized in solution , while PIDT-C12NT showed a pronounced bathochromic shift of the low energy band absorption with λ max moved from 593 nm in solution to 619 nm as thin film.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT - DTNT |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT-C12NT |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT - DTNT |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT-C12NT |

Note: I'm assuming that "PIDT" is an abbreviation for a material, as it is not explicitly defined in the text. If "PIDT" is not a material, then the valid entities would be:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| DTNT |
| EHNT |
| PIDT-C12NT |
